## poiIsRenderable() function

Return 'true' if the POI has been successfully prepared for rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function poiIsRenderable(poiInfo: PoiInfo): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  poiInfo | [PoiInfo](./harp-mapview.poiinfo.md) | PoiInfo containing information for rendering the POI icon. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
